ActorFrame.IconCommand: %function(self) StyleIcon(); if not OatProfile().OATShowHeaders then SCREENMAN:GetTopScreen():GetChild('StyleIcon'):hidden(1) end end

ActorFrame.Command: %function() if GAMESTATE:GetCoinMode() == 1 and not GetPref('EventMode') then rateMods = rateModsPay else rateMods = rateModsFree end end

Layer.InitCommand:
%function(self) self:hidden(1) oat_RPC:set('state', 'Menu') oat_RPC:set('browsingsince', os.time())
self:queuecommand('Update') end
Layer.UpdateCommand:
%function(self) local song = GAMESTATE:GetCurrentSong() if song then oat_RPC:set('pack', song:GetGroupName()) else oat_RPC:set('pack', '') end oat_RPC:update()
self:sleep(3) self:queuecommand('Update') end
